General.Name: Metro Mining Limited
General.Description: Metro Mining Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an exploration and mining company in China. The company engages in the exploration, mining, and sale of bauxite. Its flagship project is the Bauxite Hills Mine property that covers an area of approximately 1,900 square kilometers located on Western Cape York. The company was formerly known as MetroCoal Limited and changed its name to Metro Mining Limited in December 2014. Metro Mining Limited was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Brisbane, Australia.
